title: (x) Serif face and humanist sans in "13" designs - ITC Stone Serif, Foundry Sterling {Yves, Jan E}
content:
Hi all,

Got a type book today, some examples in there from a uk graphic design company called 13, one particular face I think is custom, most of the fonts in the book are mentioned, this one isn't, if it is custom, can anyone recommend any similar fonts?

Here it is:

[http://i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/art.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035156/http:/i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/art.jpg "http://i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/art.jpg")  
 [http://i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/ei.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035156/http:/i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/ei.jpg "http://i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/ei.jpg")

Also, on their website they have a nice font used here:

[http://www.thirteen.co.uk/imgs/chandos/chandos\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035156/http:/www.thirteen.co.uk/imgs/chandos/chandos_1.jpg "http://www.thirteen.co.uk/imgs/chandos/chandos\_1.jpg")

Appreciate any help.

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content: hmmm... those two links are to a protected area in their site. Try to edit your post.

\>‘chandos’  
First i thought of Bliss … wrong – Jan has found it.
